title.rendered: Meat Preservation: Why Dry Ice Is A Hunting Must-Have

content.rendered:
As a hunter, your top priority is to keep your meat fresh and safe after a successful hunt. Proper meat preservation can make the difference between delicious meals and food that is unsafe to eat. This is where dry ice comes in.

WHAT IS DRY ICE?

Dry ice is a form of carbon dioxide solidified at a temperature of -78.5°C. It is an excellent cooling agent that can keep your meat at the perfect temperature for transportation and storage. Unlike regular ice, dry ice doesn’t melt into water, making it ideal for use in coolers and travel containers.

At Dry Ice International, we understand the importance of meat preservation for hunters. After all that work, you want to preserve the fine quality of your game meats. Our dry ice is manufactured to the highest quality, ensuring your meat stays fresh for longer and is available in various sizes and quantities, so you can choose the best option for your specific needs.

HOW DO I USE IT?

Using dry ice for meat preservation is simple. Just place the dry ice in your cooler or appropriate travel container and let it do its job. The dry ice will keep your meat at the ideal temperature, preventing spoilage and ensuring that it remains safe to eat.

 WHERE CAN I GET IT?

Dry Ice International is proud to offer our services nationwide, so no matter where you are in South Africa, you can access dry ice when needed. We have a team of experts who are available to answer any questions you may have and help you choose the dry ice that is most suited for your needs.

AND THAT’S NOT ALL…

Now you’ve got your dry ice, but where do you store it? Well, worry not. We sell disposable polystyrene containers, perfect for storing dry ice and refreshments for your hunting trip.

Why polystyrene? Here’s why:

  • Polystyrene is versatile.
  • Polystyrene containers maintain temperatures for both hot and cold food and beverage items.
  • Polystyrene uses fewer resources than its paper counterparts.
  • Polystyrene is an excellent insulator.
  • Polystyrene is safe to use for transporting food.
  • Polystyrene boxes are manufactured in different shapes and sizes, thus making it easier to pack different items according to your requirement.
  • Polystyrene can absorb shock and limit the damage of goods while in transport.

It’s decided! If hunting is your thing and you want to preserve your game meat and keep your food and refreshments fresh, dry ice is a definite must-have. So, next time you go hunting, be sure to have dry ice on hand to preserve your meat and ensure you can enjoy it for many meals to come.
